pages.title: Lightning
pages.text: Cost: Spell + End Rod$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br2)XP Cost: 18$(br2)A powerful combat spell, upon being struck by a lightning projectile and the spell succeeds, the spell will strike you with a bolt of lighting
When you cast the spell, a projectile will be cast from the scroll. Once it hits a player or a block, it will strike lightning where they stand. Major damage in a matter of seconds!
